sourcesContent:
import { Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Row, Col, ListGroup, Image, Form, Button, Card} from 'react-bootstrap'; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import Message from '../components/Message'; import Loader from '../components/Loader' import { useGetOrderDetailsQuery } from '../slices/ordersApiSlice'; const OrderScreen = () => { const { id: orderId } = useParams() const { data: order, refetch, isLoading, error } = useGetOrderDetailsQuery(orderId) return ( isLoading ? : error ? ( ) : ( <>

Order {order._id}

Delivery

Name: {order.user.name}

Email: {order.user.email}

Address: {order.deliveryAddress.address}

{order.isDelivered ? ( Delivered on {order.deliveredAt} ) : ( Not Delivered )}

Payment Method

Method: {order.paymentMethod}

{order.isPaid ? ( Paid on {order.paidAt} ) : ( Not Paid )}

Order Items

{order.orderItems.map((item, index) => ( {item.name} {item.qty} x ${item.price} = ${item.qty * item.price} ))}

Order Summary

 Items SEK{order.itemsPrice} Delivery SEK{order.deliveryPrice} Tax SEK{order.taxPrice} Total SEK{order.totalPrice} {/* PAY ORDER PLACEHOLDER */} {!order.isPaid && stripe && !loadingStripeKey ? (
) : null} {/* MARK AS DELIVERED PLACEHOLDER */ } ) ); } export default OrderScreen;
